MajorClaims.Text: a universal language playing the dominant role in the international community is of vital significance to global people
a single international language contributes to global community in terms of economic and cultural communication

Claims.Text: a single international language serves an economic purpose
a universal language is an integral part of cultural communication and interactions
every country should by no means disregard the preservation of their own cultural heritage
a single international language may, to some extent, erode the cultural identity of a nation

Premises.Text: a single international language plays a pivotal role in global economic cooperation
As businessmen from different countries have access to the same language, they can communicate with each other more efficiently and deeply on trade, which can intensify the transnational cooperation
without the availability of the same language, there might be a chance that misunderstanding and conflicts would ensue over business negotiations, impeding collaborations between them

If people are equipped with a single international language, they can tell each other smoothly about their countries' specific cultures such as the traditional customs or the modern lifestyles, which enables people to expand their outlooks, viewing the world in new angles

when people travel to foreign countries, the local people can introduce the tourist attractions to such people with the command of the universal language, helping foreign visitors have an enjoyable exotic experience
people may be impressed by the cultural values brought with the universal language, eroding a sense of national belong
some Asians are seeking individualism, previously denied by many Asian countries
they have gradually identified with such values expressed in American movies, which are imported by the governments as a result of the proliferation of English
